column5: We've been going to LOTW for 9 years. Last year for the first time my brother, his wife and daughter went with. Everyone had an unbelievable time and can't wait to get back this July. The last couple years I've been trying to find a private rental cabin to rent for a couple weeks. If anyone has a rental or knows of one, please contact me. We are looking at July 9th to 22nd. We usually stay on Sabaskong but, are open to other options. I've looked at some on different websites but nothings popped out yet. Any info or ideas would be greatly appreciated. Feel free to PM me. Thanks everyone
If you haven't tried the site VRBO I would suggest it. I found a few that were very interesting.
I have looked into vrbo. I've found quite a few options farther North, towards Lenora. There were a couple worth checking into near Morson. I'm going to check closer tonight. Thank you.
Dang spell check. There are more towards Kenora.

The magazine published by the LOW Property Owner's Association usually has several classified ads for rentals.http://www.lowdpoa.com/cpages/homeIf the association can't tell you what ads they currently have let me know and I can scan and send them to you.
Crow Rock lodge has a couple remote cabins on LOTW's.
Thanks everyone, I'm checking them all.

Here is a website for you to look at: www.tripping.comFill in the location at the top as Kenora, CanadaIt shows cabins with prices and location on Lake of the Woods. Might be just what you are looking for.
